finaly i found something that seems to work. Maybe it can help someone.
I use setjmp and longjmp c standard functions.

an example code:

// a jmp_buf variable to store contex
jmp_buf contex;

// my exception class
class myException : public exception
{
public:
int err;

myException (int s) {err=s;}
~myException(){};
}

// the SIGSEGV, SIGFPE handler
int signalhandler(int s)
{
longjmp(context, s);
}

int main()
{
int i = 10;

// change signal behaviour
signal(SIGFPE, signalhandler);
signal(SIGSEGV, signalhandler);

try
{
if ((i=setjmp(context)) == 0)
{
// we volontary make a bad code
i = i / 0;
printf("i=%d\n", i);
}
else
{
// i contains the signal error
throw new myException(i);
}
}
catch(myException *e)
{
printf("exception: %s\n", strerror(e->err));
delete e;
// do any traitement
}
catch(...)
{
// we do something
}
}
